name: 黃正民
objective:
As a basic mathematics in engineering, the course Linear Algebra emphasizes on the subject of matrix computation (theory) and the technique of mathematical proving.
一、線性連立方程式
二、矩陣基本運算
三、行列式
四、向量空間與基底
五、線性相依與線性獨立
六、線性轉換
七、正交空間
八、特徵值與特徵向量
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction, Vectors, Linear Equations
Week 2. Systems of Linear Equations
Week 3. Row Reduction and Echelon Forms
Week 4. Matrix Operations
Week 5. Matrix Equation Ax=b
Week 6. Complete Solution to Ax=b
Week 7. Inverses of a Matrix
Week 8. Cramer’s Rule, Determinants, Cofactors
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. Linear Independence
Week 11. Subspaces, Basis, Vector Spaces
Week 12. Change of Basis, Dimension, Rank
Week 13. Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
Week 14. Diagonalization
Week 15. Inner Product, Length, Orthogonality
Week 16. Orthogonal Projection
Week 17. Gram-Schmidt Process
Week 18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework (with Matlab programming) 20%
Midterm Exam (closed book)         35%
Final Exam (closed book)           45%
materials:
-Textbook
David C. Lay, Linear Algebra and Its Applications, 4th ed., Pearson, 2011.
-Reference
Gilbert Strang, Introduction to Linear Algebra, 4th ed., Wellesley-Cambridge Press, 2009.
